tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Teena has been our rainbow after our difficult experience with another doctor for our previous pregnancy that led to an medical termination. 

From the first visit, Dr. Teena was super positive and kept it very real. She gives you information that you need and nothing more. She is patient to answer all your questions and also a good counsellor for when you have apprehensions and worries. One big help was her availability over messages for times when I had some challenges during pregnancy and also post delivery. 

Personally the fact that my age (37) didnt bother her and she never mentioned it or questioned me about why I/we waited so long before getting pregnant etc was very comforting. She also instilled confidence in me, by not scaring me with the usual 'Oh this is a G3 pregnancy, there could be complications.. etc etc..'  

My delivery was also normal, she didnt push for a Ceserean delivery, allowed me to go through 14 horus of labour and yet when I almost gave up, she stood by me and encouraged me to go through with the process and thanks to her, I delivered a normal healthy baby girl, who is amlost 2 months old today. 

We will be eternally grateful to Dr. Teena for her support and guidance through my pregnancy, delivery and post delivery journey. God bless you Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Scan,
review:
******** *** **** ************* ** ************************************************************************************
We visited Teena Ma'am for our first born, we visited ma'am based on recommendation, and it turned out to be the best recommendation.

What we liked about ma'am************************************************
1. She is very polite, calm, and always smiling
2. She listened to all our doubts, anwered all our questions, even
the silly ones with same smiling face, as always
3. Throughout the pregnancy period, there was not a single
instance when we felt that ma'am is in hurry to see another
patient, and hence giving us less time, it never happened. It
was always us who said, we are done with questions :)
4. Very supportive, very understanding, ma'am ensured we feel
like home when talking to her
5. She prescribes very less and only needed medicines
6. Her focus/priority is normal delivery, and not cesarean.
Although in our case, my wife couldn't have a normal delivery,
but that has nothing to do with the doctor.
7. Ma'am gave good enough time to my wife during the delivery
8. She did a regular visit to see how my wife was progressing
after the delivery.

NOTE: Throughout the pregnancy, we just followed what mam said, without a doubt.

In my and my wife's understanding, ***** ***** ** ******** *** ** *** **** **** ********* ** ****** *** ** ****** ** ******* *** * **** ***** **** she is the one who should be consulted without a doubt.

Thanks a lot Teena Ma'am

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had heard about Dr. Teena's expert knack of dealing with patients and personally witnessed it during our journey of becoming parents.

I might sound bit emotional but trust me when my wife had heavy bleeding at 14th week of her pregnancy; we were taken a back. It was subchorionic hematoma of considerable size(>50%). Dr. Teena handled the situation very sensitively and accurate to the point where her expert diagnosis of the condition helped us sail till very end of this journey. The journey after 14th weeks was tough due to multiple other complications but Dr. Teena oversaw every bit of it closely and very carefully. Itâ€™s easier to get depressed with this kind of situation at hand but with Dr. Teena you are in for a treat. The way she handled the situation with her expert medical advice and guided us, we never felt stressed because Dr. Teena brings in a sound medical advice with a composed persona. Iâ€™ve never met a doctor who is not only the expert at her field but goes all-in for a patientâ€™s care. At times, we called her at 3 AM in the morning and she wouldnâ€™t think twice before picking up the call and guided us.

Dr. Teena has enormous attention to detail, medical accuracy and excellent interpersonal communication. As a patient what more one would expect? Iâ€™ve always had a peculiar complaint off doctors in India that they donâ€™t spend enough time with patients; Dr. Teena proved me utterly wrong. She is not only a compassionate doctor but an expert in her field. She knows what she is doing and does it with ease. I was amazed to see her knowledge and philosophy of practising evidence based medicine which was not only effective but was boon in case of my wifeâ€™s complicated pregnancy since we could not have afforded to go wrong at any stage. Dr. Teena explains you the possible diagnoses in detail and doesnâ€™t rush into a decision without your comfort; she is simply amazing at dealing with patients in the most humane way.

It wouldnâ€™t be an overstatement that doctors are God for patients; Dr. Teena is indeed one for us. If it was not for her then we couldnâ€™t have made to where we are today.  Thanks to her that we are blessed with beautiful twins. Thanks Dr. Teena for everything you have done and gave us such beautiful and everlasting joy and memories to cherish for our lives!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Please don't visit Teena Thomas ** *** *** ******** *** ****** ********. I had a very bad experience. My wife had a normal delivery for the first baby and we were consulting with Dr.Garima Jain and we did consult the same doctor for second pregnancy as well. Unfortunately the doctor had to go for vacation during our due date so we had to consult Teena Thomas for the delivery.  During first meet itself she said we will deliver baby tomorrow morning , ** **** ******** *** *** ******* ****** **** **** *** **** **** Then we told her my wife's first delivery was normal and we don't have an issue with second baby in scan until the due date so we want to try normal delivery. She was least interested *** ******** ** ****** * ******* ** ****** **** Then she asked us to get admitted. During the delivery time also, she made sure my wife is not moving from the bed, connecting all the nst machines etc.though baby's heart beat is fine, not sure why for 8hrs they had to connect nst. *** ****** ******** ** ******* ******* ****** **** ****** ****** ****** ********* **** **** **** *** *********** Finally we had to go for c section as doctor wished. ***** ** ******** **** *** ****** *** *** ***** * ******* ******* ** **** *** *** *** ** ***** ** ***** **** **** *** ** *** ****** **** ** **** *** ****** ******** ** ******* *** ***** **** ** **** *** ***** **** ** ****** ********* Very pathetic experience. ** *** ***** **** **** ***** * ***** **** ***** **** ***** ** ***. I'm seeing all the post delivery pain my wife is going through, *** *** ** **** ****** ***** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Our experience with Dr. Teena Thomas was outstanding. Her professional approach and commitment to our well-being were evident from the start. Dr. Teena avoided unnecessary medications and tests, ensuring a focused and efficient journey.

She maintained clear communication, addressing our concerns with empathy and reassurance. Her expertise led to a successful, normal delivery, and her commitment to avoiding unnecessary panic made the entire process stress-free.

We highly recommend her for exceptional and precise care throughout the pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,
review:
I have been consulting Teena Thomas madam after I conceived. She guided me and my husband throughout the delivery (Delivered baby girl on August1st). I didn't face any kind of difficulties during the 9 months. She was always there to help through whatsapp for any emergencies.

Teena madam is such a good person who talks calmly and is ready to answer any kind of queries. She is more like a friend who treats her patients with cheerfulness ( This is what is needed in a Doctors so that patient doesn't panic).

She is such an eminent and highly experienced professional that I have ever come across.

I highly recommend Teena madam for those who are insearch of a very good Gynaecologist and obstetrician in Bangalore.

It's just not worth the money and that's it !
Avoid visiting her if one wants to saved from unnecessary wastage of time and money and efforts because the person we are paying just does not care!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We were scared and nervous throughout our pregnancy due to so many hurdles we faced and for each hurdle Dr Teena Thomas was there to guide and help us in overcoming those fears and complications. She constantly gave her suggestion and advice at any given point of time ***** ***** *** *** ** *** **** *** ********** ************** I was very scared of delivery but had a smooth one only because of Dr Teena and her team. Hats off to their expertise and experience. With all these, I highly recommend Dr Teena thomas for any new expecting parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Teen Thomas - you can trust your life with her !With me being a paitient of cysts, Obesity & depression for years, was worried & anxious about everything related to pregnancy.Dr Teena was a saviour & explained me all different ways & means available to help.She made me calm down with her systematic & soothing approach.The preconception, 9 months of pregnancy & the C - Section was all smooth in her guidence & excellant skills.I cant thank her enough for all the support she extended to me & for the safe delivery of my beautiful daughter.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Highly recommend Teena mam.
2 miscarriage prior to successful delivery.
All the three times we did consultation with mam. I have lupus for the past 12 years. So pregnancy wasn't a cake walk. Mam had all the patience to deal with any situation, so understanding and her expertise is beyond our imagination. Everyone suggested when we went for third time pregnancy planning to consult a different gynaecologist,but we were sure that, if we deliver, it would be teena mam who would!. 
Her availability for your emergencies wil make you feel, she is near to God. 
Had a beautiful delivery experience and we are happy with our little girl. 
She has all the experience in dealing high risk pregnancies. Thoroughly recommend her for a blissful experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: All 5 stars are for Dr. Teena Thomas, She is excellent throughout the journey of 9 months. She doesnâ€™t suggest any medicines or scans unnecessarily, for any treatment or any medication she will clearly explain why those are required. She listens all the concerns very patiently and answers every question you ask without any frustration. Apart from treatment we liked her moral support. Especially when my wife get tensed during some circumstances her support and guidance is priceless. My family especially my mother is more happy with Teenaâ€™s treatment and guidance. I refer Teena Thomas without any second thought.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you is not enough to express our feelings. You are the most amazing doctor we have ever come across, and your advice and caring nature have provided us with the best experience so far. We are incredibly grateful for the wonderful gift you've given us in the form of our baby boy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

We blessed with a healthy baby boy in normal delivery n I can say itâ€™s the grace of God n Teena mam. Thank you so much for everything.

review: Dr. Teena is an awesome doctor. Best part about her treatment is that she doesn't prescribe unnecessary medications. She is extremely friendly and made me feel very comfortable. I was very scared as I have gone through 2 miscarriages before, she made sure that she talks me through my inhibitions. I am grateful for her support and treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
If it was not for Dr Teena, it would have been very difficult. I had complications in my pregnancy and had pains in my tummy right through the third trimester. Dr teena took the lead and guided us through this journey very efficiently. Her adeptness and competence is at par. She will get you through your difficult times and make sure that your bundle of joy is delivered to you healthy and safe. 

100% recommend her for your pregnancy needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I planned to visit Dr. Teena Thomas based on the pregnancy experience of my family friend. We are really satisfied with her pre and post delivery care. She was very clear in explaining everything in detail on every consultation. I would strongly recommend anyone to consult Dr. Teena Thomas for pregnancy related concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted Dr. Teena for my wife's pregnancy. We are really blessed to got treatment from her. She explains the problems clearly She will follow up everything with patientShe got great knowledge and experience. I would really recommend this doctor to everyone.

review:
Dr Teena made my pregnancy experience a total bliss. Apart from being super talented and proficient, she is empathetic, friendly, genuine and very helpful. she really tries to understand her patient, gives sufficient time in each visit and gives the best treatment possible. Never pushes for unnecessary tests. Dear doctor, I feel so lucky to have you as my doctor. You are the best. Lots of love
Sudha

review: I consulted Dr. Teena Thomas throughout my pregnancy and I'm happy about the whole experience. She is a straight forward person and tells all facts upfront. She explained the scan reports, medicines, etc and it helped me understand better. All I had do is follow her advice about exercises and nutrition. I had normal delivery and she attended me at 3am. I'll definitely recommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am so happy to write about Teena maâ€™am as my pregnancy and delivery journey went smooth with the help of her. I had several issues like low bp and vomiting throughout my pregnancy and anxiety etc. But she helped us a lot, mainly she was available always whenever we required. She will tell you only what you need to know and she wonâ€™t scare you with unwanted stuff. We used to be calm and tension free after each visit, while we go to hospital with multiple questions. We are blessed with twins now and special thanks to her for making our journey easy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We have had started consulting her about our MCDA twin pregnancy at early stage itself.
She is a no-nonsense professional. Explained us clearly all the risks involved in this high-risk pregnancy and supported and guided us to a successful delivery of full-term twins. She constantly monitored the growth of babies and health of mother and adjusted dosage of medicines and supplements which, I believe, helped the babies attain good weight (2.34 and 2.48 kgs). Babies and mother were discharged on the third day itself after a C-section delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
First of all A big thank you to Dr Teena thomas 
My story - My pregnancy was not smooth as I had some complications during my pregnancy 
I myself being a doctor
Some of my doctor colleagues scared me like I can't have normal delivery 
I can't complete full term pregnancy 
My baby weight won't cross 2.5kg etc
But instead of listening them 
I trusted Dr Teena mam
And she kept my trust with a motherly love and concern and helped me during my whole journey of pregnancy and I delivered full term baby with normal delivery and she won't prescribe any unnecessary medications .
I want to recommend Dr Teena to one and all pregnant ladies ..u can trust her blindly 
Thanks mam once again !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I decided to check up with Dr Teena Thomas for my pregnancy based on the reviews in practo. I do not regret the decision and I would say she is one of the best in her field. First of all she is very cool , friendly and has a lot patience. She listens to our concerns and explains everything in detail. She is very well experienced and totally dedicated to her work. I had done my IUI treatment with her and it fell on the day of Easter Sunday. She still came to the hospital and did the procedure. I was later pregnant with twins. With twins I had a number of complications and she always kept calm which helped me not to panic.She responds on whatapp as well and never once did she get impatient. She always has a smile and that gives you more confidence.It was a wonderful experience with her and would definitely recommend her to my friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am so happy and grateful to write about Dr Teena thomas as my pregnancy journey went very smooth with the help of her. She listens to every problem, explains diet and exercises at every visit, prescribes limited scans and gives only required medicines. I delivered healthy baby girl on 9th July  2023- sunday evening through vaginal delivery. She was very quick in reaching hospital on sunday for urgent delivery. We would strongly recommend Dr Teena thomas at motherhood hospital Sarjapur

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: During our 20th week growth scan, our baby had a hyper echogenic bowel. Our regular doctor scared us and asked us to get amniocentosis done which we were not ready due to the risk of miscarriage. We then contacted Dr Teena Thomas who assured that nothing to be worried of a Single Soft Marker.Her words gave us a lot of courage and were able to take a decision without any haste. Our 28th week scan turned out to be everything good. We always remember Dr Teena Thomas  for her encouraging words.
